testcase.classname: F01_Registration | user could register with new accounts
testcase.name: user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter "Mahmoud" and "Shehata"......................................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "mahmoudshehata@gmail.com".............................passed And user enter Password "Mshe@123456" and "Mshe@123456".....................passed And user click on register button...........................................passed Then user register successfully.............................................passed

testcase.classname: user could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given User GO TO loginPage..................................................passed When user enter login "valid" "mahmoudshehata@gmail.com" and "Mshe@123456"..passed And user press login button.................................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: user could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given User GO TO loginPage..................................................passed And user enter login "invalid" "mahmoud@mo.com" and "P@ss"..................passed And user press login button.................................................passed Then user could not login...................................................passed

testcase.classname: F06_SlidersWrapper | users will be able to open sliders in home page
testcase.name: first slider is clickable on home page
testcase.failure:
Given user clicks on first slider...........................................passed Then relative product for first slider is displayed.........................failed
